title: 粘液科技报错
txt_content:
[Server thread/WARN]: [Slimefun] Task #13 for Slimefun v4.2-UNOFFICIAL-200224 generated an exception
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Cannot translate null text
        at org.apache.commons.lang.Validate.notNull(Validate.java:192) ~[spigot-1.15.2.jar:git-Spigot-800b93f-8160e29]
        at org.bukkit.ChatColor.translateAlternateColorCodes(ChatColor.java:354) ~[spigot-1.15.2.jar:git-Spigot-800b93f-8160e29]
        at me.mrCookieSlime.CSCoreLibPlugin.general.Inventory.ChestMenu.<init>(ChestMenu.java:42) ~[?:?]
        at io.github.thebusybiscuit.slimefun4.core.guide.ChestSlimefunGuide.create(ChestSlimefunGuide.java:625) ~[?:?]
        at io.github.thebusybiscuit.slimefun4.core.guide.ChestSlimefunGuide.openMainMenu(ChestSlimefunGuide.java:68) ~[?:?]
        at me.mrCookieSlime.Slimefun.SlimefunGuide.openMainMenu(SlimefunGuide.java:95) ~[?:?]
        at me.mrCookieSlime.Slimefun.SlimefunGuide.lambda$null$0(SlimefunGuide.java:90) ~[?:?]
        at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_15_R1.scheduler.CraftTask.run(CraftTask.java:81) ~[spigot-1.15.2.jar:git-Spigot-800b93f-8160e29]
        at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_15_R1.scheduler.CraftScheduler.mainThreadHeartbeat(CraftScheduler.java:394) [spigot-1.15.2.jar:git-Spigot-800b93f-8160e29]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_15_R1.MinecraftServer.b(MinecraftServer.java:1036) [spigot-1.15.2.jar:git-Spigot-800b93f-8160e29]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_15_R1.DedicatedServer.b(DedicatedServer.java:399) [spigot-1.15.2.jar:git-Spigot-800b93f-8160e29]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_15_R1.MinecraftServer.a(MinecraftServer.java:984) [spigot-1.15.2.jar:git-Spigot-800b93f-8160e29]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_15_R1.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:824) [spigot-1.15.2.jar:git-Spigot-800b93f-8160e29]
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [?:1.8.0_111]

replies.author: EmptyLava
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 EmptyLava 于 2020-3-14 14:34 编辑 

Cannot translate null text
更新或回退同人翻译的核心
要不然就是你动了核心里面的东西导致翻译错误，要不然就是当时翻译插件的时候出现错误

好像是粘液科技的主界面翻译错误，你还可以试试在备份的情况下删除slimefun配置文件


或者拆包，查找ChestSlimefunGuide.java:68和其上下堆栈对堆的代码，看看哪里翻译错了
